pci_projects_project_regions_description: OVH offers several solutions for creating infrastructures, or containers. By default, you have access to a selection of locations, but you can choose to add new locations.
pci_projects_project_regions_info_messag: Adding new locations may take up to a few minutes. Once the locations have been added, you can add servers or containers to them.
pci_projects_project_regions_add_region_: An error has occurred adding the location: {{message}}
The {{ code }} location is being activated â€” this may take up to 60 minutes. You will be notified by email once the location is available.
